name: Meomidorian Prince
description:
just a small, for-fun RPG that's meant to take anywhere from 45-minutes to an hour and a half.  A bit dating sim, a bit coming-of-age. No combat. 

This is my first ever RPG Maker MV project, and my first official game. There may be some bugs, but I'll work hard to fix any/all as they are reported.

---

Credit for crown edits and generator pieces go to Kadakowa/Enterbrain, and Bokou for edits. Credit to Yunary's generator pieces.

Credit to GALV, sumrndm, Yami, and Yanfly plugins. Credit to Minnow's RTP edits for squirrel, rabbit, deer, among other animal sprites.
